key_commands.description: Lists all pods in the namespace to identify failing components (geo pod in Error state).
Retrieves logs from the failing geo pod to reveal the DB connection error and port mismatch (mongodb-geo:27777).

key_commands.command: exec_shell("kubectl get deploy geo -n test-hotel-reservation -o yaml && kubectl get svc mongodb-geo -n test-hotel-reservation -o yaml && kubectl logs -n test-hotel-reservation mongodb-geo-<POD_SUFFIX> --all-containers=true --tail=100")
key_commands.description: Inspects geo deployment and mongodb-geo service configuration and checks MongoDB pod logs to confirm service port (27017) and validate the root cause (geo misconfiguration).
key_commands.original_command: exec_shell("kubectl get deploy geo -n test-hotel-reservation -o yaml && kubectl get svc mongodb-geo -n test-hotel-reservation -o yaml && kubectl logs -n test-hotel-reservation mongodb-geo-5ff578bcb8-xv9q6 --all-containers=true --tail=100")

key_commands.description: Submits the identified faulty component (geo) as the root cause.
